Description: CloudWatch Dashboards to visualize EC2 resources. Both dashboards leverage Dashboard Variables to filter on the desired resources. Dashboard 'EC2_All_Resources' visualizes ALL EC2 resources in the target region. Dashboard 'EC2_Individual_Resources' provides additional filters to isolate a specific EC2.

DefaultAccountID.Description: Input the AWS Account ID hosting the load balancers to be monitored.(e.g. 123456789012)

DefaultRegion.Description: Select the default region hosting the load balancers to be monitored.

DefaultEC2.Description: Input the default EC2 Instance to be monitored. (e.g. i-abcdefg012345)

properties.markdown:
# Disk: Instance Store


If there are [no instance store volumes](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/viewing_metrics_with_cloudwatch.html#ec2-cloudwatch-metrics), it is expected that  the following metrics will report a value of `0` or no values is published:

metrics.expression: REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Usage,Type,Resource,Service,Class} MetricName="CallCount" Service="EC2" Type="API" Class="None"', 'Sum', 60), SUM, DESC))
metrics.label: ${PROP('Dim.Resource')}

metrics.expression: REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Usage,Type,Resource,Service,Class} MetricName="ThrottleCount" Service="EC2" Type="API" Class="None"', 'Sum', 60), SUM, DESC))
metrics.label: ${PROP('Dim.Resource')}

metrics.expression: REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Usage,Type,Resource,Service,Class} MetricName="ErrorCount" Service="EC2" Type="API" Class="None"', 'Sum', 60), SUM, DESC))
metrics.label: ${PROP('Dim.Resource')}

metrics.expression: REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Usage,Type,Resource,Service,Class} MetricName="ResourceCount" Service="EC2" Type="Resource" Class="Standard/OnDemand"', 'Average', 300), AVG, DESC))
metrics.label: ${PROP('Dim.Resource')}

metrics.expression: REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Usage,Type,Resource,Service,Class} MetricName="ResourceCount" Service="EC2" Type="Resource" Class="Standard/OnDemand"', 'Average', 300), AVG, DESC))
metrics.label: ${PROP('Dim.Resource')}

metrics.expression: REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Usage,Type,Resource,Service,Class} MetricName="ResourceCount" Service="EC2" Type="Resource" Class="NetworkAddressUsage"', 'Average', 60), AVG, DESC))
metrics.label: ${PROP('Dim.Resource')}

metrics.expression: REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Usage,Type,Resource,Service,Class} MetricName="ResourceCount" Service="EC2" Type="Resource" Class="NetworkAddressUsage"', 'Average', 60), AVG, DESC))
metrics.label: ${PROP('Dim.Resource')}

metrics.expression: REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Usage,Type,Resource,Service,Class} MetricName="ResourceCount" Service="EC2" Type="Resource" Class="NetworkAddressUsagePeered"', 'Average', 60), AVG, DESC))
metrics.label: ${PROP('Dim.Resource')}

metrics.expression: REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Usage,Type,Resource,Service,Class} MetricName="ResourceCount" Service="EC2" Type="Resource" Class="NetworkAddressUsagePeered"', 'Average', 60), AVG, DESC))
metrics.label: ${PROP('Dim.Resource')}

properties.markdown: # Disk: EBS Metrics for Nitro Instances

metrics.expression: REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Usage,Type,Resource,Service,Class} MetricName="ThrottleCount" Service="EC2" Type="API" Class="None"', 'Sum', 60), SUM, DESC))
metrics.label: ${PROP('Dim.Resource')}

metrics.expression: REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Usage,Type,Resource,Service,Class} MetricName="ErrorCount" Service="EC2" Type="API" Class="None"', 'Sum', 60), SUM, DESC))
metrics.label: ${PROP('Dim.Resource')}
